comments:
Hi
I am seeing "org.eclipse.swt.SWTError: Font not valid Problem" error while 
launching eclipse on HP-UX (ia65_32, motif).  I have listed a portion of error 
message here. Please see the attachment for complete error messages

==============================================

Command-line arguments:  -os hpux -ws motif -arch ia64_32

!MESSAGE Application error
!STACK 1

org.e
clipse.jface.resource.FontRegistry.calculateDefaultFont(FontRegistry.java:476)

(FontRegistr
y.java:495)

JP
